issue.title: [CF 511] Melee weapon swings CDs
issue.body:
I would like you to insert a feature to track the Melee Weapon swings (like the Auto Shoot for hunters) as a Cooldown or any other form taking in account, if possible, also the off-hand attacks.
Thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user Artanis76 | Imported from CurseForge issue #511 | Raw

comments.body:
I personally have also found myself wishing for lua conditions to be able to check for the remaining duration on whitehits. Something like CooldownDuration("mainhandmeleeswingtimer") < CooldownDuration("gcd") would be ideal


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

is it possible? if possible, how to?


> Posted by CurseForge user magistw

Added in r703. There is now an icon type for this, two conditions, and you can use the following function in your Lua conditions:

``` SwingDuration(slot) ```

Slot is:

  • 16 for mainhand
  • 17 for offhand

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
